name: Boys Tale
description:
This game is a jigsaw puzzle.
The story unfolds with the appearance of 4 characters including the main character.
There are 15 puzzle stages for every 3 characters. When you clear all the puzzle stages,
the game's story progresses and you can see animations of the characters.


This is the story of the adventure and affection of Xia,
a fairy tale writer who fell into a mysterious world one day.

Go and meet the characters of the distorted fairy tale with Xia.
Match the pieces of the image with them and return them to normal.

Let's put the image puzzle together and lead the story of Xia.
